code: export var UsersActionTypes={UPDATE:"UPDATE",UPDATE_SUCCESS:"UPDATE_SUCCESS",UPDATE_ERROR:"UPDATE_ERROR",CHANGE_PASSWORD:"CHANGE_PASSWORD",CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUCCESS:"CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUCCESS",CHANGE_PASSWORD_ERROR:"CHANGE_PASSWORD_ERROR"};Object.keys(UsersActionTypes).forEach(function(key){UsersActionTypes[key]="USER_".concat(UsersActionTypes[key]);});var onUpdate=function onUpdate(_ref){var id=_ref.id,params=_ref.params;return{type:UsersActionTypes.UPDATE,payload:{id:id,params:params}};};var onUpdateSuccess=function onUpdateSuccess(detail){return{type:UsersActionTypes.UPDATE_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onUpdateError=function onUpdateError(error){return{type:UsersActionTypes.UPDATE_ERROR,payload:error};};var onChangePassword=function onChangePassword(data){return{type:UsersActionTypes.CHANGE_PASSWORD,payload:data};};var onChangePasswordSuccess=function onChangePasswordSuccess(detail){return{type:UsersActionTypes.CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onChangePasswordError=function onChangePasswordError(error){return{type:UsersActionTypes.CHANGE_PASSWORD_ERROR,payload:error};};var UsersAction={onUpdate:onUpdate,onUpdateSuccess:onUpdateSuccess,onUpdateError:onUpdateError,onChangePassword:onChangePassword,onChangePasswordSuccess:onChangePasswordSuccess,onChangePasswordError:onChangePasswordError};export default UsersAction;
